changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `snooze` ( `id` BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `definition` BLOB NOT NULL, `starttime` TIMESTAMP(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6), `endtime` TIMESTAMP(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6), `enabled` BINARY(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `deleted` BINARY(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `namespaceid` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `createdby` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `createdtime` TIMESTAMP(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6), `updatedby` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `updatedtime` TIMESTAMP(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6), PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_snooze_namespace` FOREIGN KEY (`namespaceid`) REFERENCES `namespace` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `snooze_contact` ( `snoozeid` BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `contactid` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`snoozeid`, `contactid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_snooze_contact_snooze` FOREIGN KEY (`snoozeid`) REFERENCES `snooze` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_snooze_contact_contact` FOREIGN KEY (`contactid`) REFERENCES `contact` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `favorite_folder` ( `id` BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userid` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, `folderid` BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `createdtime` TIMESTAMP(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6), PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `uq_userid_folderid` (`userid`, `folderid`), INDEX `fk_favorite_folder_folder_idx` (`folderid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_favorite_folder_user` FOREIGN KEY (`userid`) REFERENCES `user` (`userid`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_favorite_folder_folder` FOREIGN KEY (`folderid`) REFERENCES `folder` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `folder_activity` ( `userid` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, `folderid` BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `lastvisitedtime` TIMESTAMP(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6), PRIMARY KEY (`userid`, `folderid`), INDEX `fk_folder_activity_folder_idx` (`folderid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_folder_activity_user` FOREIGN KEY (`userid`) REFERENCES `user` (`userid`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_folder_activity_folder` FOREIGN KEY (`folderid`) REFERENCES `folder` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB;
